description:
Applies a mask to a raster data cube. To apply a vector mask use ``mask_polygon()``.

A mask is a raster data cube for which parallel pixels among `data` and `mask` are compared and those pixels in `data` are replaced which are non-zero (for numbers) or `true` (for boolean values). The pixel values are replaced with the value specified for `replacement`, which defaults to `null` (no data).

mask.description: A mask as raster data cube. Every pixel in `data` must have a parallel element in `mask`.

replacement.description: The value used to replace masked values with.
